title: Assumption Novena
description: Prepare for eternal life with Mary. Pray the Assumption Novena now and receive the grace of a holy death. Honor the Queen crowned body and soul in Heaven.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Lord Jesus Christ, You have destroyed the power of death and given the hope of eternal life for body and soul. You granted Your Mother a special place in your glory, and did not allow decay to touch her body. As we rejoice in the Assumption of Mary, grant us renewed confidence in the victory of life over death. Amen. Holy Queen, I rejoice in your Assumption to Heaven. After your life of love and suffering on earth, God took you to be with Him in glory forever. Through your Assumption, help me to overcome sin and become the saint that God has made me to be. Impress upon me the truth that death is the gateway to eternal life with your Son, and that at the Resurrection my body and soul shall reunite and be glorified in the unalloyed joy of Heaven. Until that great day, while on my pilgrimage of life, I ask for your powerful intercession in this novena, especially for, (mention request here‚Ä¶) When I face the hour of my death, be my intercessor and mother before Jesus, that He may bring me to that ineffable banquet with you in the Beatific Vision.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be O Queen Assumed into Heaven, pray for us. Amen

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
